Tool Library

NameSpline Interpolation
AuthorO. Conrad (c) 2006-10
Version1.0
File/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/saga/libgrid_spline.so

Description

Several spline interpolation/approximation methods for the gridding of scattered data. In most cases the 'Multilevel B-spline Interpolation' might be the optimal choice.

Tools

IDName
1Thin Plate Spline
2Thin Plate Spline (TIN)
3B-Spline Approximation
4Multilevel B-Spline Interpolation
5Multilevel B-Spline Interpolation (from Grid)
6Cubic Spline Approximation
7Multilevel B-Spline Interpolation for Categories
